name: Kursed Kitty
description:
You are a sorcerer who, in an unfortunate accident, has managed to curse yourself! Luckily, you know the antidote to this curse, and set out to catch the extremely rare gold rats that you need. However, the curse dictates that, should you ever jump, you will die.

Fortunately, this curse also transforms you into a cat.

Make every one of your nine lives count.

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move/Jump
R: Restart Level
Esc: Quit Game
